column2: Avoidance (Avo) - Avoids occupational activities that involve significant interpersonal contact because of fears of criticism, disapproval, or rejection.
Certainty of being liked (Like) - Is unwilling to get involved with people unless certain of being liked.
Restraint in relationships (Res) - Shows restraint within intimate relationships because of the fear of being shamed or ridiculed.
Fear of criticism and rejection (FCR) - Is preoccupied with being criticized or rejected in social situations.
Inhibition (Inh) - Is inhibited in new interpersonal situations because of feelings of inadequacy.
Inferiority (Inf) - Views self as socially inept, personally unappealing, or inferior to others.
Reluctance to risk (Risk) - Is unusually reluctant to take personal risks or to engage in any new activities because they may prove embarrassing.
